text: The 2 co - stars play lovers within the Italian countryside, however in actual life, they ’ re simply two guys which have grown into nice pals. Whereas on the pink carpet on the GQ Males of the Yr Get together, the actors informed E! Information ’ Melanie Bromley that their friendship is “ precisely ” like their characters. Armie, being the jokester, added, “ Virtually precisely — besides we hate one another. ”
